name: Fighter Prototype
description:
How to Play: 

Use A, D or Left, Right Arrow Keys to move left and right. 

Left Mouse click to swing attack.

ESC key to pause game 

===============================================================

Description: 

I figured this game jam would be a good way to jump start my production of making a fighting game. I took this as an opportunity to make a prototype to hopefully showcase to an artist. I am in desperate need of an artist. If you are willing to do some art and get involved in the making of this game hit me up @DevDanyel on twitter.
